description: Forest Dept. - Kokebe Forest and Nambakde Natural Forest in Kahatagasdigiliya D/S Division, Anuradhapura District as Reserved Forests - Semawa Forest in Medawachchiya D/S Division, Anuradhapura District as Conservation Forest - Rahatankanda Forest in Buttala D/S Division, Monaragala District as Conservation Forest - Bogahapelessa Forest Haldummulla D/S Division, Badulla District as Reserved Forest
